metadata.title: CVE-2016-0819 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Qualcomm performance component in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 allows attackers to gain privilegesvia a crafted application, aka internal bug 25364034.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

android - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-copyright - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-emulator - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-images - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-runtime - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20160307-0742-0ubuntu3').
